action.action-desc: Mr. Rooney of Florida introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security

form.official-title: To direct the Administrator of the Transportation Security Administration to prohibit certain employees of the Transportation Security Administration from using the title of officer and from wearing metal badges or uniforms resembling those of law enforcement officers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stop TSA Abuses Act.

section.header: Prohibition on certain employees of the Transportation Security Administration using the title officer and wearing metal badges or uniforms resembling those of law enforcement officers

subsection.text: The Administrator of the Transportation Security Administration) shall prohibit any employee of the Transportation Security Administration described in subsection (b) who is not a sworn law enforcement officer with arresting authority and who has not successfully completed Federal, State, or local law enforcement training from—

paragraph.text: using the official job title of officer; or
wearing a metal badge resembling a police badge or a uniform resembling the uniform of a Federal law enforcement officer.

subsection.text: An employee described in this subsection is any of the following:

paragraph.text: Any other employee the Administrator of the Transportation Security Administration determines appropriate.
